options.help: Do not encapsulate chunked data.
options.name: disable

options.help: Encapsulate chunked data into a new chunk.
options.name: enable

options.help: Support X-Scan-Progress-Interval ICAP header.
options.name: scan-progress

icap-block-log.help: Enable/disable UTM log when infection found (default = disable).
icap-block-log.name: icap-block-log

options.help: Disable UTM log when infection found.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable UTM log when infection found.
options.name: enable

base64-encoding.help: Enable/disable use of base64 encoding of HTTP content.
base64-encoding.name: base64-encoding

options.help: Disable use of base64 encoding of HTTP content.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable use of base64 encoding of HTTP content.
options.name: enable

methods.default: delete get head options post put trace other
methods.help: The allowed HTTP methods that will be sent to ICAP server for further processing.
methods.name: methods

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with DELETE method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: delete

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with GET method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: get

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with HEAD method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: head

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with OPTIONS method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: options

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with POST method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: post

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with PUT method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: put

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with TRACE method to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: trace

options.help: Forward HTTP request or response with All other methods to ICAP server for further processing.
options.name: other

preview.help: Enable/disable preview of data to ICAP server.
preview.name: preview

options.help: Disable preview of data to ICAP server.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable preview of data to ICAP server.
options.name: enable

preview-data-length.help: Preview data length to be sent to ICAP server.
preview-data-length.name: preview-data-length

request.help: Enable/disable whether an HTTP request is passed to an ICAP server.
request.name: request

options.help: Disable HTTP request passing to ICAP server.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable HTTP request passing to ICAP server.
options.name: enable

request-failure.help: Action to take if the ICAP server cannot be contacted when processing an HTTP request.
request-failure.name: request-failure

options.help: Error.
options.name: error

options.help: Bypass.
options.name: bypass

request-path.help: Path component of the ICAP URI that identifies the HTTP request processing service.
request-path.name: request-path

request-server.help: ICAP server to use for an HTTP request.
request-server.name: request-server

respmod-default-action.help: Default action to ICAP response modification (respmod) processing.
respmod-default-action.name: respmod-default-action

options.help: Forward response to icap server unless a rule specifies not to.
options.name: forward

options.help: Don't forward request to icap server unless a rule specifies to forward the request.
options.name: bypass

action.help: Action to be taken for ICAP server.
action.name: action

options.help: Forward request to ICAP server when this rule is matched.
options.name: forward

options.help: Don't forward request to ICAP server when this rule is matched.
options.name: bypass

case-sensitivity.help: Enable/disable case sensitivity when matching header.
case-sensitivity.name: case-sensitivity

options.help: Ignore case when matching header.
options.name: disable

options.help: Do not ignore case when matching header.
options.name: enable

response.help: Enable/disable whether an HTTP response is passed to an ICAP server.
response.name: response

options.help: Disable HTTP response passing to ICAP server.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable HTTP response passing to ICAP server.
options.name: enable

response-failure.help: Action to take if the ICAP server cannot be contacted when processing an HTTP response.
response-failure.name: response-failure

options.help: Error.
options.name: error

options.help: Bypass.
options.name: bypass

response-path.help: Path component of the ICAP URI that identifies the HTTP response processing service.
response-path.name: response-path

response-req-hdr.help: Enable/disable addition of req-hdr for ICAP response modification (respmod) processing.
response-req-hdr.name: response-req-hdr

options.help: Do not add req-hdr for response modification (respmod) processing.
options.name: disable

options.help: Add req-hdr for response modification (respmod) processing.
options.name: enable

response-server.help: ICAP server to use for an HTTP response.
response-server.name: response-server

streaming-content-bypass.help: Enable/disable bypassing of ICAP server for streaming content.
streaming-content-bypass.name: streaming-content-bypass

options.help: Disable bypassing of ICAP server for streaming content.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable bypassing of ICAP server for streaming content.
options.name: enable
